nodes.title: Complete Texas Roadhouse Menu Guide 2025
nodes.excerpt: Discover everything you need to know about Texas Roadhouse's menu, from signature steaks to legendary rolls. Updated for 2025 with prices and nutrition info.
nodes.content:
Texas Roadhouse has been serving up legendary steaks and fresh-baked bread since 1993. Our comprehensive menu guide covers everything from hand-cut steaks to fall-off-the-bone ribs.

Signature Steaks

Our steaks are hand-cut fresh daily and grilled to perfection. Popular choices include the 6oz USDA Choice Sirloin and the 23oz Porterhouse for sharing.

Famous Sides

Don't miss our legendary fresh-baked bread with cinnamon butter, served warm at every table. Our loaded sweet potato and seasoned rice are also customer favorites.

seo.title: Complete Texas Roadhouse Menu Guide 2025 - Prices & Nutrition
seo.metaDesc: Comprehensive guide to Texas Roadhouse menu items, prices, and nutrition information. Find your favorite steaks, ribs, and sides updated for 2025.

nodes.title: Best Texas Roadhouse Appetizers to Start Your Meal
nodes.excerpt: From the famous Cactus Blossom to loaded potato skins, discover the must-try appetizers at Texas Roadhouse that will kick off your meal perfectly.
nodes.content:
Texas Roadhouse appetizers are the perfect way to start your dining experience. Each appetizer is made fresh and designed to share.

Cactus Blossom

Our signature appetizer features a whole onion, seasoned, battered and fried until golden. Served with our special Cajun horseradish sauce.

Awesome Blossom Petals

Love the Cactus Blossom but want something smaller? Try our Awesome Blossom Petals - all the flavor in bite-sized pieces.

Loaded Potato Skins

Crispy potato skins loaded with mixed cheese, bacon, and served with sour cream and chives.

seo.title: Best Texas Roadhouse Appetizers - Cactus Blossom & More
seo.metaDesc: Discover the best Texas Roadhouse appetizers including the famous Cactus Blossom, loaded potato skins, and more shareable starters.

nodes.title: Texas Roadhouse Ribs: Fall-Off-The-Bone Perfection
nodes.excerpt: Learn about Texas Roadhouse's famous fall-off-the-bone ribs, cooking methods, and why they're a customer favorite. Plus nutrition info and pricing.
nodes.content:
Texas Roadhouse ribs are slow-cooked for hours until they literally fall off the bone. Our signature dry rub and smoking process creates the perfect combination of flavor and tenderness.

Our Cooking Process

Each rack of ribs is rubbed with our signature blend of spices and slow-smoked for hours. The result is tender, flavorful meat that requires no sauce - though our BBQ sauce is available on the side.

Full and Half Racks

Choose from a full rack (perfect for sharing) or a half rack as part of our combination meals. Both come with your choice of two sides.

seo.title: Texas Roadhouse Ribs Guide - Fall-Off-The-Bone BBQ Ribs
seo.metaDesc: Everything about Texas Roadhouse's famous fall-off-the-bone ribs, including cooking methods, pricing, and nutrition information.

nodes.title: Texas Roadhouse Family Meals: Perfect for Groups
nodes.excerpt: Discover Texas Roadhouse family meal options that feed 4-6 people. Great value with complete meals including sides, bread, and dessert options.
nodes.content:
Texas Roadhouse family meals are designed to feed groups of 4-6 people with generous portions of our most popular items. Each family meal includes sides, fresh-baked bread, and your choice of entrees.

Family Pack Options

Choose from various combinations including our steak family pack, chicken family pack, or mixed grill options. All include fresh bread and cinnamon butter.

Great Value

Family meals offer significant savings compared to ordering individually, making them perfect for family dinners or small gatherings.

seo.title: Texas Roadhouse Family Meals - Feed 4-6 People
seo.metaDesc: Texas Roadhouse family meal options for groups. Great value meals that feed 4-6 people with steaks, chicken, sides, and fresh bread.

nodes.title: The Secret Behind Texas Roadhouse's Legendary Bread
nodes.excerpt: Discover what makes Texas Roadhouse bread so special, from the fresh-baked rolls to the famous cinnamon butter that keeps customers coming back.
nodes.content:
Texas Roadhouse bread is legendary among restaurant chains. Fresh-baked throughout the day and served warm with our signature cinnamon butter, it's often the highlight of the meal.

Fresh-Baked Daily

Our bread is baked fresh in each restaurant throughout the day. The aroma of fresh bread baking is part of the Texas Roadhouse experience.

Cinnamon Butter

Our famous cinnamon butter is made with real butter, cinnamon, and a touch of honey. It's whipped to perfection and served at the perfect temperature.

Unlimited Refills

The best part? The bread and cinnamon butter are complimentary and unlimited for all dine-in guests.

node.altText: Texas Roadhouse Fresh Bread with Cinnamon Butter

seo.title: Texas Roadhouse Legendary Bread & Cinnamon Butter Recipe
seo.metaDesc: Learn about Texas Roadhouse's famous fresh-baked bread and cinnamon butter. Discover what makes this complimentary appetizer so special.
